1142643.author: kiwiinbacon
1142643.markdown:
##  ** Hey guys! Before anything, Make sure to watch this video.  
**

KiwiiNbacon here. For those who don't know me, I'm a multiple time legendary
player on the NA server. I also do deck showcase videos on youtube once in a
while. Join us for some tip and tricks!

I bet you would never believe that a paladin deck full of divine shields could
rival with the most any top tier deck in terms of tempo or being able to
control a board as effectively as possible. Not so. With this deck, not only
will you be able to have the nuttiest of curve but also be able to compete for
glory. Now I do have to say This is not the most tryhard of decks BUT it works
decently well and is a ton of fun to play!

The point of this deck is to play your minions on curve and get the most of
every single divine shield that gets put into play. whether it is trough a
giant [ Blood Knight ](/cards/75-blood-knight) , [ Light's Sorrow
](/cards/61833-lights-sorrow) or [ Bolvar, Fireblood ](/cards/61831-bolvar-
fireblood) you will be looking forward to make sure your opponent has
difficulty clearing your minions while you slap them in the face for insane
damage.  
  
Guide Coming Soon!

<del> ** _____________________________________________________________________
___________________________________ ** </del>

Don't forget to sub: [ https://www.youtube.com/user/CanadianRumPunch
](https://www.youtube.com/user/CanadianRumPunch) for more decks like this one
in the future!

I hope you guys enjoy playing this deck as much as I did, and May the top
decks be in your favor.

*THANKS A LOT FOR ALL THE SUPPORT !* 

  
  
Full Guide coming soon!

1144345.author: il_defa
1144345.markdown:
So, I know what you are thinking: "A Miracle Rogue with no sense cards like [
Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) and [ Myra's Unstable Element
](/cards/89802-myras-unstable-element) ? You are crazy!"

Let me introduce you to  the new best _ "fantacombo" _ of the century  !

_ Before start leave an upvote on this deck for more strange combo decks! _

** Cards needed for the combo: **

  *     * [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) : it's the core card: without this the combo won't work. 
    * [ Myra's Unstable Element ](/cards/89802-myras-unstable-element) : it's an important card that helps you to clear your deck. 
    * 1x [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) : it's an important piece of the combo because it will kill [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) . 
    * 2x [ Shadowstep ](/cards/550-shadowstep) : they are the cards that allows you to get cheaper [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) and [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) . 
    * 1x [ Backstab ](/cards/471-backstab) : it allows you to kill [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll)

** How the combo works: **

Be sure to have [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) , [ Voodoo Doll
](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) , 2x [ Shadowstep ](/cards/550-shadowstep) , [
Myra's Unstable Element ](/cards/89802-myras-unstable-element) and 1x [
Backstab ](/cards/471-backstab) in your hand.

  1. Use [ Myra's Unstable Element ](/cards/89802-myras-unstable-element) to get an empty deck and play every card drawn 
  2. Play [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) and return this to your hand with [ Shadowstep ](/cards/550-shadowstep)
  3. Play [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) and return this to your hand with [ Shadowstep ](/cards/550-shadowstep)
  4. When your board, deck,  and hand are empty of not combo cards, play [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) and target him with [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) . 
  5. Kill [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) with [ Backstab ](/cards/471-backstab) and win! :D 

** Tips: **

  *     * You can replace the rest of the deck with other cards, but i think that a miracle Rogue [a Rogue that draws so many times] is the best choice. 
    * Do the combo in the explained order, because if you use [ Myra's Unstable Element ](/cards/89802-myras-unstable-element) with a not full/semi-full hand you are forced to play many other cards. 
    * You aren't forced to win with the combo: you can use also combo cards for a tempo play especially versus an aggro deck. 

** Fan's combo ideas: **

** As I repeated many times, _ [ Assassinate ](/cards/568-assassinate) WON'T kill one of your minion!  _ **

** [ Rvo2099 ](https://www.hearthpwn.com/members/Rvo2099) : **

  1. Use [ Myra's Unstable Element ](/cards/89802-myras-unstable-element) with the same combo pieces in your hand. 
  2. Use [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) and [ Shadowstep ](/cards/550-shadowstep) it. 
  3. Play [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) and use a [ The Coin ](/cards/141-the-coin) [gained with [ WANTED! ](/cards/89363-wanted) ] 
  4. Play [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) , [ Backstab ](/cards/471-backstab) it and win! :D 

** [ Vitya_Pinguinus ](https://www.hearthpwn.com/members/Vitya_Pinguinus) : **

  1. Use [ Myra's Unstable Element ](/cards/89802-myras-unstable-element) with the same combo pieces in your hand. 
  2. Use [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) and [ Shadowstep ](/cards/550-shadowstep) it. 
  3. Play [ Galvanizer ](/cards/89891-galvanizer) [on [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) ] 
  4. Play [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) and [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) it. 
  5. [ Backstab ](/cards/471-backstab) [ Voodoo Doll ](/cards/89404-voodoo-doll) and win! :D 

** Edits: **

  * Removed 2x [ Fal'dorei Strider ](/cards/76914-faldorei-strider) and added 2x [ Hench-Clan Thug ](/cards/89456-hench-clan-thug)

_ ** I hope so much that you enjoyed this deck, leave an upvote and share this
strange deck with your friends! ** _ ** :D **
1144345.title: [The Boomsday Project] Mecha'thun Miracle Otk R...

1145874.author: WillPwn
1145874.markdown:
##  ![](https://i.imgur.com/maqPjhL.png)

##  Galvanized Mecha'thun

Shaman OTK Mecha'thun for Boomsday Project

> _ A new alternative Shaman OTK to Shudderwock. Discount your Mecha'thun,
thin your deck & destroy the enemy hero. _

###  THE OTK SETUP:

_ [ Galvanizer ](/cards/89891-galvanizer) allows you to drop the cost of [
Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) in your hand down to ** 6 mana **
(although even 8 is fine) with the help of [ Murmuring Elemental
](/cards/76971-murmuring-elemental) , opening up the possibility of you
destroying your own Mecha'thun for the OTK. _

_ ![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/356/419/76971.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/15/636686424647272734.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/877/636685164584329562.png) _

###  THE OTK ACTIVATION:

_ With your (now discounted to 8 or 6 mana) [ Mecha'thun
](/cards/89877-mechathun) you have 2-4 mana free to trigger his deathrattle
with the help of a combination of [ Crushing Hand ](/cards/76998-crushing-
hand) and/or [ Zap! ](/cards/89439-zap) to end the game. _

_ _ ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/877/636685164584329562.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/356/110/76998.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/369/261/636590945500375380.png)

###  THINNING YOUR DECK:

_ In order to trigger [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) you're going to
need to empty your hand & deck, so alongside some great control & draw tools
you'll utilize [ Hemet, Jungle Hunter ](/cards/55508-hemet-jungle-hunter)
alongside draw combo's like [ Acolyte of Pain ](/cards/428-acolyte-of-pain) &
[ Volcano ](/cards/52581-volcano) . You've also got the new [ Electra
Stormsurge ](/cards/89804-electra-stormsurge) alongside cards like [ Far Sight
](/cards/107-far-sight) and [ Elementary Reaction ](/cards/89939-elementary-
reaction) . If you're concerned about Hemet sticking to the board & ruining
the OTK, the deck runs a spare [ Crushing Hand ](/cards/76998-crushing-hand)
for him if he doesn't get cleared naturally. _

![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/374/995/636674474796912219.png)
![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/330/0/107.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/147/636687472719056520.png)

![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/335/169/55508.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/330/354/428.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/334/869/52581.png)

###

> ##  TECH CHOICES & ALTERNATIVES

>

> I've settled on the current Shudderwock Control choices of 2x [ Mind Control
Tech ](/cards/368-mind-control-tech) but you could consider swapping one of
these out for a [ Gluttonous Ooze ](/cards/55488-gluttonous-ooze) depending on
how the meta settles.

>

> I'm also running 2x [ Crushing Hand ](/cards/76998-crushing-hand) to allow
you the flexibility to draw and burn one with [ Hemet, Jungle Hunter
](/cards/55508-hemet-jungle-hunter) or alternatively use the spare one on
Hemet himself, but you could just consider running 1x.

>

> A [ Sandbinder ](/cards/89464-sandbinder) might be a good fit due to the
draw necessity and the targets it has with [ Glacial Shard ](/cards/55485
-glacial-shard) & [ Electra Stormsurge ](/cards/89804-electra-stormsurge) .
I've omitted it due to the risk of Hemet'ing and leaving it behind.

>

> Could also run the newly listed [ Elementary Reaction ](/cards/89939
-elementary-reaction) , which along with [ Electra Stormsurge ](/cards/89804
-electra-stormsurge) , would grant additional control tools. It's against the
run of play of fatiguing your own deck though.

Thanks for reading, check out my other Boomsday Project deck;

##  [ Magnetic Bomber ](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1150015-magnetic-
bomber)  
[ ![](https://i.imgur.com/0pjsro7.png)
](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1150015-magnetic-bomber)

##  [ Kangor's Buff Army ](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1152492-kangors-
buff-army)  
[ ![](https://i.imgur.com/Kbdw1R7.png)
](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1152492-kangors-buff-army)
1145874.title: Galvanized Mecha'thun

1146101.author: kiwiinbacon
1146101.markdown:
** Here is a video pulling the entire combo off!! **   
  
  
While the new expansion is coming out in roughly a week, some of us are a bit
tired and would enjoy playing something fun rather than being extremely
competitive while waiting for our new toys to play with. This is completely
understandable.  
  
What I have here for you today is a remastered version of what used to be Mill
Warlock but with a twist. In this deck we are going to play [ Glinda Crowskin
](/cards/89352-glinda-crowskin) as well as [ Prince Keleseth ](/cards/58723
-prince-keleseth) and hoping for some unexpected results. there are a few
cards that might not be quite optimal but the idea is to have as much fun as
possible.  
  
** Your Goal   
  
** what you are looking to do with this deck is quite simple.   
Step 1: play a [ Meat Wagon ](/cards/62849-meat-wagon)  
Step 2: get that meat wagon to die and play [ Glinda Crowskin ](/cards/89352
-glinda-crowskin)  
Step 3: Play as many [ Prince Keleseth ](/cards/58723-prince-keleseth) as
possible  
Step 4: ???  
Step 5: Profit  
  
** Mulligan **

You are specifically looking to start with [ Kobold Librarian ](/cards/76926
-kobold-librarian) and [ Stonehill Defender ](/cards/55529-stonehill-defender)
. If you have the coin and also have a librarian, you can try to get a [
Lesser Amethyst Spellstone ](/cards/76924-lesser-amethyst-spellstone) or
alternatively, a [ Hellfire ](/cards/122-hellfire)  
  

** Match-ups **

seems like we have to wait a couple of days before I can put any interesting
data in here.

Thanks for all the support I will make more decks in the future :D <del>  
</del>

<del> ** _____________________________________________________________________
___________________________________ ** </del>

Don't forget to sub: [ https://www.youtube.com/user/CanadianRumPunch
](https://www.youtube.com/user/CanadianRumPunch) for more decks like this one
in the future!

I hope you guys enjoy playing this deck as much as I did, and May the top
decks be in your favor.

-KiwiiNbacon
1146101.title: Glinda's Favorite Boii

1146532.author: Schnez01
1146532.markdown:
Just a cheeky bit of theorycrafting with Mecha'Thun, using Even Warlock as a
base. I will be testing this deck day 1 of the expansion, and will also post a
Mulligan guide if this can get +20 up-votes. Note that this deck list is
likely to change before 'The Boomsday Project' is released.

** In case you missed it, combo is as follows: **

  1. Empty your deck (easy to do with 1 mana hero power) 
  2. Play 2x [ Galvanizer ](/cards/89891-galvanizer) with [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun) in hand (cost will be reduced to 8 mana) 
  3. Play [ Mecha'thun ](/cards/89877-mechathun)
  4. Play [ Bloodbloom ](/cards/55594-bloodbloom) and [ Cataclysm ](/cards/76918-cataclysm) . 
  5. Bam you win! 

** Edit: ** I decided to replace 2x [ Loot Hoarder ](/cards/395-loot-hoarder) with 2x [ Plated Beetle ](/cards/76995-plated-beetle) for better early game. 

_ ** I ** _ _ ** f you like the deck please up-vote ** _
1146532.title: Even Mecha'Thun Can Win

1149159.author: Trumpsc
1149159.markdown:
The Azalina Soulthief and Lifedrinker defeat Shudderwock, so they're necessary
if Shudderwock is in the meta.
1149159.title: Dr. Boom Control

1150015.author: WillPwn
1150015.markdown:
##

_ Inspired by the Goblin Bomb master [ Moofio85
](https://www.hearthpwn.com/members/Moofio85/decks) _

##  Magnetic Bomber

Hunter Magnetic Mech deck ft. Deathrattle Goblin Bombs

> Using the new Goblin Bombs and Magnetic Mech synergies to create big boards
that threaten constant face Deathrattle damage and generation

###  BOMB GENERATION:

Although not great as a standalone minion, [ Goblin Bomb ](/cards/89850
-goblin-bomb) becomes a real threat on wider boards due to a load of synergy
with other mechanics. The deck includes some great bomb generation tools like
[ Whirliglider ](/cards/89919-whirliglider) , [ Explodinator
](/cards/89910-explodinator) & [ Boommaster Flark ](/cards/89848-boommaster-
flark) .

_ ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/505/636681637466146814.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/127/636687449909280965.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/118/636687419176121308.png) _

_ ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/507/636681641321375570.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/507/636681641321375570.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/507/636681641321375570.png) _

###  BOMB DEATHRATTLE SYNERGY:

Goblin Bomb starts to shine when the threats of combo's come into play, with
it's Deathrattle triggering early thanks to [ Fireworks Tech ](/cards/89854
-fireworks-tech) , [ Necromechanic ](/cards/89917-necromechanic) & [
Spiritsinger Umbra ](/cards/55522-spiritsinger-umbra) .

_ _ ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/533/636681924659219399.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/125/636687435025271665.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/335/205/55522.png)

###  MAGNETISE BOMBS INTO THREATS:

_ The new Magnetic mechanic allows you to turn your 0/2 [ Goblin Bomb
](/cards/89850-goblin-bomb) s into real board threats and start to control the
board with Mechs like [ Spider Bomb ](/cards/89807-spider-bomb) , [ Wargear
](/cards/89799-wargear) & [ Zilliax ](/cards/89803-zilliax) . [ Venomizer
](/cards/89921-venomizer) will proove a great surprise posion clear too. _

![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/374/999/636674477672530838.png)
![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/374/990/636674457914409174.png)
![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/3/636674500079731700.png)

![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/129/636687452406803101.png)
![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/104/636687401685753164.png)
![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/105/636687402917414988.png)

###  CONTROLLING THE BOARD:

_ The old guard of [ Defender of Argus ](/cards/542-defender-of-argus) , [
Fungalmancer ](/cards/76991-fungalmancer) & [ Bonemare
](/cards/61834-bonemare) further bolster the Goblin Bomb stats and allow for
stronger board control. _

![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/330/483/542.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/356/223/76991.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/370/17/636591521684409521.png)

###  VALUE TURN 1:

_ The new [ Mecharoo ](/cards/89933-mecharoo) and [ Jo-E Bot
](/cards/89948-jo-e-bot) proove great value on turn 1. They can be bolstered
by a [ Skaterbot ](/cards/89897-skaterbot) or triggered with a [ Fireworks
Tech ](/cards/89854-fireworks-tech) turn 2 to provide a great alternative mech
for our magnetic synergy. _

![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/141/636687466135059050.png)
![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/185/636687761243459173.png)
![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/105/636687402917414988.png)

###  POWERFUL COMBOS:

_ As an example; A Turn 10 [ Spiritsinger Umbra ](/cards/55522-spiritsinger-
umbra) & [ Explodinator ](/cards/89910-explodinator) , with a [ Bomb Toss
](/cards/89913-bomb-toss) to a friendly board Goblin Bomb is 8 Face Damage and
a board full of threats! _

_ ![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/335/205/55522.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/118/636687419176121308.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/375/507/636681641321375570.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/157/636687497701949759.png) _

> ##  TECH CHOICES & OMISSIONS

>

> ![](https://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/356/217/73325.png) ![](https
://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/335/82/55505.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/339/667/58724.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/339/376/62891.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/145/636687470633909348.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/356/443/76973.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/330/492/597.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/339/470/61811.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/368/903/636590939483223053.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/299/636688324760617745.png) ![](https://media-
hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/376/347/636688325512373259.png)

>

> I've painstakingly omitted [ Deathstalker Rexxar ](/cards/58724
-deathstalker-rexxar) as I think this deck is more on the aggro side. If it's
struggling late game he's the first port of call for inclusion.

>

> I've also omitted [ Terrorscale Stalker ](/cards/55505-terrorscale-stalker)
, [ Play Dead ](/cards/62891-play-dead) and [ Carnivorous Cube ](/cards/73325
-carnivorous-cube) , as the deathrattle value isn't great for the sake of
dealing 2 extra damage face. I think building and controlling board around the
threat of the [ Goblin Bomb ](/cards/89850-goblin-bomb) 's is enough. Going
BIG on Deathrattle would require inclusion of bigger Deaththrattle threats
like [ Mechanical Whelp ](/cards/89852-mechanical-whelp) .

>

> I also considered [ Goblin Prank ](/cards/89937-goblin-prank) for a while
but I think that fits better in the afformentioned BIG Deathrattle focussed
version of the deck with cube’s, stalkers, play dead’s & big minions. I’ve
tried to make this version board-control heavy where you want your goblin
bombs to ‘stick’ a bit more to the board, where the 2 damage to the face is a
punishment for clearing them. In that respect triggering our deathrattles is
fine but we don’t want the [ Goblin Bomb ](/cards/89850-goblin-bomb) 's to die
unnecessarily as we lose Magnetic/Mech synergy potential.

>

> In the same respect; I felt [ Void Ripper
](https://www.hearthpwn.com/cards/76973-void-ripper) would be a frustrating
top deck or mulligan in this deck, when it's really an end game OTK better
suited into the above mentioned BIG Deathrattle cube variant. Our [ Goblin
Bomb ](/cards/89850-goblin-bomb) Deathrattles will still ultimately get
triggered if we want, when we bolt any of our Magnetic Mech's onto our bombs,
or when we drop a [ Defender of Argus ](https://www.hearthpwn.com/cards/542
-defender-of-argus) or [ Fungalmancer
](https://www.hearthpwn.com/cards/76991-fungalmancer) down inbetween them for
pushing minions or threatening face damage. The threat of that Deathrattle
damage is still there ... we just hold board control too alongside it. The
same goes for [ Abomination ](/cards/597-abomination) , [ Ticking Abomination
](/cards/61811-ticking-abomination) & [ Mossy Horror ](/cards/89417-mossy-
horror) .

Thanks for reading, check out my other Boomsday Project deck;

##  [ Galvanized Mecha'thun ](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1145874
-galvanized-mechathun)  
[ ![](https://i.imgur.com/maqPjhL.png)
](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1145874-galvanized-mechathun)

##  [ Kangor's Buff Army ](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1152492-kangors-
buff-army)  
[ ![](https://i.imgur.com/Kbdw1R7.png)
](https://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/1152492-kangors-buff-army)
1150015.title: Magnetic Bomber

1154073.author: FeelzbatmanHS
1154073.markdown:
####  New Patch 12.0 brought new copy mechanic. Now you can copy 0 mana
Shudderwocks with Azalina!

Let me introduce you to the new best Anti Shudderwock Taunt Warrior deck.

** _ Before start leave an upvote on this deck for more strange combo decks! _ **

_ _ Mulligan, Gameplay Video and more tips are coming... _ _

##  ** Cards needed for the combo: **

[ Azalina Soulthief ](/cards/89334-azalina-soulthief) and [ Bring It On!
](/cards/61824-bring-it-on) are the core cards.

After opponent play [ Shudderwock ](/cards/89437-shudderwock) , he gets 1/1
copy. We play [ Bring It On! ](/cards/61824-bring-it-on) then play [ Azalina
Soulthief ](/cards/89334-azalina-soulthief) .

Finally, we get INFINITE 0 mana [ Shudderwock ](/cards/89437-shudderwock) .

How do we get armor and heal?

Before doing this combo, you should play [ Cornered Sentry ](/cards/55517
-cornered-sentry) \+ [ Drywhisker Armorer ](/cards/76944-drywhisker-armorer)
with exact order. (Infinite Armor)

For the heal, you have [ Lifedrinker ](/cards/89471-lifedrinker) .

How do we get rid of extra bodies of Shudderwocks to play it infinite?

[ Primordial Drake ](/cards/55533-primordial-drake) and [ Blood Razor
](/cards/61815-blood-razor) can do it.

###  ** For the other decks: **

You can play the deck as classic Taunt Warrior.

The deck specially counters Taunt Druids with [ Cornered Sentry ](/cards/55517
-cornered-sentry) . Because you give opponent 1/1 beast. This screw up the [
Witching Hour ](/cards/89380-witching-hour) \+ [ Carnivorous Cube
](/cards/73325-carnivorous-cube) combo.

Armor, heal, removals and taunt cards will counter aggro and tempo decks such
as Odd Paladin, Zoolock, Tempo Mage, Tempo Rogue and Hunters.

###  _ ** I hope so much that you enjoyed this deck, leave an upvote and share
this strange deck with your friends! ** _ ** :D **
1154073.title: [P 12.0] ShudderKiller New Meta
